naslov: Makarska, Veliko Brdo, luksuzna vila 500.00 m2 (prodaja)
opis: Makarska, Veliko Brdo, luksuzna nova Villa s 3 stambene jedinice! Luskuzna, novo izgrađena villa (2024.) oduzima dah čim stupite na posjed!. Savršeni spoj moderne arhitekture u kombinaciji s nizom detalja koji daju onu potrebnu toplinu da se osjećate kao kod kuće i prostor prihvatite kao svoj. Villa je građena od prvoklasnih materijala i vrhunski opremljena. Panoramski pogled u beskrajno plavetnilo mora, bazen, palme, veliki otvoreni prostor, priroda koja Vas okružuje i miluje svojim mirisima i zvukovima u Vama stvara asolutni mir i užitak. Udaljena od buke i vreve, a tek za koju minutu vožnje od plaža, restorana, grada, ova villa pravi je odabir za miran i siguran obiteljski život, ili bavljenje luksuznim turizmom! Villa se sastoji od: 1. Prizemlje + polovica prvog kata otpada na četverosobni stan s 3 kupaonice, dnevni boravak, kuhinja, hodnik, sve povezano unutarnjim stepenicama. Također tom stanu pripada dvorište s bazenom i dva balkona na gornjoj etaži ukupne veličine balkona 30m2. Trenutno je taj stan u funkciji iznajmljivanja i ostvaruje super prihode. 2. Druga polovica prvog kata otpada na jednosoban stan s jednom kupaonicom, dnevnim boravkom i kuhinjom s vlastitim balkonom od 15m2. 3. Drugi kat odnosi se na trosobni stan s dvije kupaonice, vešeraj, dnevni boravak, kuhinja i hodnik kojem također pripada balkon veličine 30m2. Villa posjeduje sveukupno 6-7 parking mjesta (oko 100m2 parkinga), dva podruma ukupne veličine oko 40m2. Također posjeduje centralni bojler od 500 l, podno grijanje na struju provučeno kroz cijelu kuću, klima uređaje u svim prostorijama, rolete na struju, blindo protupožarna vrata na ulazima u stanove itd. KONTAKT: 095 368 8 368, Ranko Cvitanić The luxurious, newly built villa (2024) takes your breath away as soon as you step onto the property!. A perfect combination of modern architecture combined with a series of details that give the necessary warmth to make you feel at home and accept the space as your own. The villa was built from first-class materials and is superbly equipped. A panoramic view of the endless blue of the sea, a swimming pool, palm trees, a large open space, nature that surrounds you and caresses you with its smells and sounds creates absolute peace and pleasure in you. Far from the noise and hustle and bustle, and only a few minutes' drive from beaches, restaurants, the city, this villa is the right choice for a quiet and safe family life, or luxury tourism! The villa consists of: 1. The ground floor + half of the first floor is a four-room apartment with 3 bathrooms, living room, kitchen, corridor, all connected by internal stairs. The apartment also has a yard with a swimming pool and two balconies on the upper floor with a total balcony size of 30m2. Currently, this apartment is rented out and generates great income, which can be verified under the name Villa 5. 2. The second half of the first floor is a one-room apartment with one bathroom, living room and kitchen with a private balcony of 15 m2. 3. The second floor is a three-room apartment with two bathrooms, a laundry room, a living room, a kitchen and a hallway, which also has a 30m2 balcony. The house has a total of 6-7 parking spaces (about 100m2 of parking space), two basements with a total size of about 40m2. It also has a 500 l central water heater, electric underfloor heating throughout the house, air conditioners in all rooms, electric blinds, blind fire doors at the entrances to the apartments, etc. CONTACT:  095 368 8 368, Ranko Cvitanić
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Etažno centralno na struju
